description:
Bring on the mountains! This lightweight alpine boot thrives in diverse and challenging terrain. Whether long approaches with glacier crossings, rock routes or via ferratas – the Makra Combi GTX will stop at (almost) nothing. Its weight-optimised sole has an aggressive tread pattern that offers outstanding grip and traction.

The high-quality suede and Cordura® upper will cope with everything you throw at it. And thanks to the GORE-TEX lining, it ensures that your feet stay warm and dry.

*** All Hanwag boots are sold under UK sizing - Please see size chart for details/conversion.
name: HanWag Makra Combi GTX - Mens
